verses.text: Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; I \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thee, the \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, the \w love|strong="H0160"\w* of thine \w espousals|strong="H3623"\w*, when thou \w wentest|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* me in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, in a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add that was\add* not \w sown|strong="H2232"\w*.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft thee: or, for thy sake\f*

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add and\add* the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of his \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*: all that \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* him shall \w offend|strong="H0816"\w*; \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and all the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, What \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* have your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in me, that they are gone \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me, and have \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, and are become \w vain|strong="H1891"\w*?

Neither \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they, Where \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that brought us \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, that \w led|strong="H3212"\w* us through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, through a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w deserts|strong="H6160"\w* and of \w pits|strong="H7745"\w*, through a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w drought|strong="H6723"\w*, and of the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, through a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* passed \w through|strong="H5674"\w*, and where no \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*?

And I \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* you into a \w plentiful|strong="H3759"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof and the \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* thereof; but when ye \w entered|strong="H0935"\w*, ye \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* my \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w made|strong="H7760"\w* mine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* an \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*.\f + \fr 2.7 \ft a plentiful…: or, the land of Carmel\f*

The \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* not, Where \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? and they that \w handle|strong="H8610"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* me not: the \w pastors|strong="H7462"\w* also \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* by \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \add things that\add* do not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*.

¶ Wherefore I will yet \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* with you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and with your \w children’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* will I \w plead|strong="H7378"\w*.

For pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* of \w Chittim|strong="H3794"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; and \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*, and \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* \w diligently|strong="H3966"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* if there be such a thing.\f + \fr 2.10 \ft over: or, over to\f*

Hath a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w changed|strong="H3235"\w* \add their\add* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, which \add are\add* yet no \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*? but my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have \w changed|strong="H4171"\w* their \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* for \add that which\add* doth not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*.

Be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, O ye \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, at this, and be horribly \w afraid|strong="H8175"\w*, be ye \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w desolate|strong="H2717"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w evils|strong="H7451"\w*; they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me the \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \add and\add* hewed them \w out|strong="H2672"\w* \w cisterns|strong="H0877"\w*, \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w cisterns|strong="H0877"\w*, that can \w hold|strong="H3557"\w* no \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

¶ \add Is\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*? \add is\add* he a \w homeborn|strong="H1004"\w* \add slave\add*? \w why|strong="H4069"\w* is he \w spoiled|strong="H0957"\w*?\f + \fr 2.14 \ft spoiled: Heb. become a spoil?\f*

The young \w lions|strong="H3715"\w* \w roared|strong="H7580"\w* upon him, \add and\add* \w yelled|strong="H5414"\w*, and they \w made|strong="H7896"\w* his \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w waste|strong="H8047"\w*: his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* are \w burned|strong="H3341"\w* without \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*.\f + \fr 2.15 \ft yelled: Heb. gave out their voice\f*

Also the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Noph|strong="H5297"\w* and \w Tahapanes|strong="H8471"\w* have \w broken|strong="H7462"\w* the crown of thy \w head|strong="H6936"\w*.\f + \fr 2.16 \ft have…: or, feed on thy crown\f*

Hast thou not \w procured|strong="H6213"\w* this unto thyself, in that thou hast \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w when|strong="H6256"\w* he \w led|strong="H3212"\w* thee by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*?

And now what hast thou to do in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Sihor|strong="H7883"\w*? or what hast thou to do in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5104"\w*?

Thine own \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* shall \w correct|strong="H3256"\w* thee, and thy \w backslidings|strong="H4878"\w* shall \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* thee: \w know|strong="H3045"\w* therefore and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that \add it is\add* an \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add thing\add* and \w bitter|strong="H4751"\w*, that thou hast \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and that my \w fear|strong="H6345"\w* \add is\add* not in thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ For of old \w time|strong="H5769"\w* I have \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* thy \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w*, \add and\add* \w burst|strong="H5423"\w* thy \w bands|strong="H4147"\w*; and thou \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not \w transgress|strong="H5674"\w*; when upon every \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w* and under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* thou \w wanderest|strong="H6808"\w*, playing the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*.\f + \fr 2.20 \ft transgress: or, serve\f*

Yet I had \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* thee a noble \w vine|strong="H8321"\w*, wholly a \w right|strong="H0571"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*: how then art thou \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* into the degenerate \w plant|strong="H5494"\w* of a \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* unto me?

For though thou \w wash|strong="H3526"\w* thee with \w nitre|strong="H5427"\w*, and take thee \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w soap|strong="H1287"\w*, \add yet\add* thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* is \w marked|strong="H3799"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

How canst thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I am not \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w*, I have not \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*? \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*, \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: \add thou art\add* a \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* \w dromedary|strong="H1072"\w* \w traversing|strong="H8308"\w* her \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*;\f + \fr 2.23 \ft thou art…: or, O swift dromedary\f*

A wild \w ass|strong="H6501"\w* \w used|strong="H3928"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add that\add* snuffeth \w up|strong="H7602"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* at her \w pleasure|strong="H0185"\w*; in her \w occasion|strong="H8385"\w* who can turn her \w away|strong="H7725"\w*? all they that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* her will not \w weary|strong="H3286"\w* themselves; in her \w month|strong="H2320"\w* they shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* her.\f + \fr 2.24 \ft A wild…: or, O wild ass, etc\f*\f + \fr 2.24 \ft used: Heb. taught\f*\f + \fr 2.24 \ft her pleasure: Heb. the desire of her heart\f*\f + \fr 2.24 \ft turn…: or, reverse it?\f*

\w Withhold|strong="H4513"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* from being \w unshod|strong="H3182"\w*, and thy \w throat|strong="H1627"\w* from \w thirst|strong="H6773"\w*: but thou \w saidst|strong="H0559"\w*, There is no \w hope|strong="H2976"\w*: no; for I have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them will I \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 2.25 \ft There…: or, Is the case desperate?\f*

As the \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* is \w ashamed|strong="H1322"\w* when he is \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, so is the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H3001"\w*; they, their \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, their \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and their \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and their \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="H0559"\w* to a \w stock|strong="H6086"\w*, Thou \add art\add* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; and to a \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, Thou hast brought me \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*: for they have \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \add their\add* \w back|strong="H6203"\w* unto me, and not \add their\add* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: but in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w* they will \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us.\f + \fr 2.27 \ft brought…: or, begotten me\f*\f + \fr 2.27 \ft their back: Heb. the hinder part of the neck\f*

But where \add are\add* thy \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* that thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee? let them \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, if they can \w save|strong="H3467"\w* thee in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of thy \w trouble|strong="H7451"\w*: for \add according to\add* the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* are thy \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.\f + \fr 2.28 \ft trouble: Heb. evil\f*
Wherefore will ye \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* with me? ye all have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

In \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* have I \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* your \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; they \w received|strong="H3947"\w* no \w correction|strong="H4148"\w*: your own \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* your \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, like a \w destroying|strong="H7843"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*.

¶ O \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, \w see|strong="H7200"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Have I been a \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H3991"\w*? wherefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, We are \w lords|strong="H7300"\w*; we will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* no more unto thee?\f + \fr 2.31 \ft We are…: Heb. We have dominion\f*

Can a \w maid|strong="H1330"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* her \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w*, \add or\add* a \w bride|strong="H3618"\w* her \w attire|strong="H7196"\w*? yet my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me \w days|strong="H3117"\w* without \w number|strong="H4557"\w*.

Why \w trimmest|strong="H3190"\w* thou thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*? therefore hast thou also \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* the wicked \w ones|strong="H7451"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

Also in thy \w skirts|strong="H3671"\w* is \w found|strong="H4672"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w innocents|strong="H5355"\w*: I have not \w found|strong="H4672"\w* it by secret \w search|strong="H4290"\w*, but upon all these.\f + \fr 2.34 \ft secret…: Heb. digging\f*

Yet thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, Because I am \w innocent|strong="H5352"\w*, surely his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* shall \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from me. Behold, I will \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* with thee, because thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, I have not \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

Why gaddest thou \w about|strong="H0235"\w* so \w much|strong="H3966"\w* to \w change|strong="H8138"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*? thou also shalt be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, as thou wast \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*.

Yea, thou shalt go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from him, and thine \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon thine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* thy \w confidences|strong="H4009"\w*, and thou shalt not \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* in them.
